HERO.DESCRIPTION: Eliminate stockouts and overstocking forever. Our intelligent platform gives you real-time visibility and automated workflows to scale your business effortlessly.

FEATURES.ANALYTICS_DESC: Gain deep insights into your inventory performance. Track sales velocity, profit margins, and forecast demand with AI-powered precision.
FEATURES.WORKFLOWS_DESC: Set triggers for low stock alerts and auto-generate purchase orders.
FEATURES.WAREHOUSE_DESC: Synchronize stock across unlimited locations instantly.
FEATURES.INTEGRATIONS_DESC: Connect with Shopify, Amazon, WooCommerce, and more in just a few clicks.

CTA.TITLE: Ready to optimize your operations?
CTA.DESCRIPTION: Join thousands of businesses that trust us to keep their operations running smoothly. Start your 14-day free trial today.

FOOTER.TAGLINE: Revolutionizing inventory management for modern businesses.
